channel.title: machine_learning on Zelong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in machine_learning on Zelong's Blog

item.title: A Search Engine for Academic Computer VisionÂ Papers
item.description: We proposed a new search engine for papers published on ICCV and CVPR in recent years, which has been deployed on AWS and can be accessed via this link. Full code is available on our Github.

item.title: A Survey on Logic Reasoning in Text Mining
item.description: A short review of some recent researches on logic reasoning.

item.title: A Simple Guide to Subgradient
item.description: For non-smooth (non-differentiable) functions, subgradients can work as well as gradients when it comes to optimization. Check the definition and principle of subgradients here.
